overview: This video offers massages using the principles of traditional Chinese medicine, such as Tui Na, energy oil massage, these massages will work as well on muscle relaxation as on lines and energy points to to promote the circulation of the latter. Egyptian massage which aims to harmonize the chakras. Energetic Qigong treatments, where work on the energetic body is always going to be done in order to regain well-being. As well as Qi Gong courses, Chinese energetic "gymnastics", it is a slow movement coming to support the breathing, with the aim of keeping it healthy.
title: Tuina Therapy - Qi Gong
